name: tm12
effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sweet Scent Gen I: Water Gun)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
